moduleMetadataJson.name: Cisco IOS SNMP Configuration Grabber (TFTP)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will download the startup or running configuration
        from a Cisco IOS device using SNMP and TFTP. A read-write SNMP
        community is required. The SNMP community scanner module can
        assist in identifying a read-write community. The target must
        be able to connect back to the Metasploit system and the use of
        NAT will cause the TFTP transfer to fail.
author: pello <fropert@packetfault.org>
hdm <x@hdm.io>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: SOURCE
options.description: Grab the startup (3) or running (4) configuration (Accepted: 3, 4)

options.name: OUTPUTDIR
options.description: The directory where we should save the configuration files (disabled by default)

options.name: LHOST
options.description: The IP address of the system running this module
